text: Cuatrecasasiella is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family, described as a genus in 1986.Robinson, Harold Ernest. 1986. Flora Neotropica, Monograph 39: 14Robinson, Harold Ernest. 1985. Flora Neotropica, Monograph 2(Suppl.): 15Tropicos, Cuatrecasasiella H. Rob. The entire genus is native to South America.Flann, C (ed) 2009+ Global Compositae Checklist ; SpeciesThe Plant List, search for Cuatrecasasiella * Cuatrecasasiella argentina (Cabrera) H.Rob. \- northwest Argentina, northern Chile, Bolivia * Cuatrecasasiella isernii (Cuatrec.) H.Rob. \- Ecuador, Peru ==References== Category:Asteraceae genera Category:Flora of South America Category:Gnaphalieae
title: Cuatrecasasiella
